text: William "Will" Truman is a character in Will & Grace. He is a lawyer and is gay. He was played by Eric McCormack. Will lived in the hotel with his Jewish friend. Grace Adler lived next door with Jack McFarland. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1998 Category:Fictional gay men Category:Will & Grace characters nl:Will & Grace#Will(iam) Truman
title: Will Truman
